name: Scary Assassin Part 2
description:
Escape from the different levels and collect all the notes. A terrifying experience that will make you want to play more.

(Thx for the asset "eyes of horror" by Alexey rayne) P.S: the game has 2 levels of this asset but is all changed. On the two other levels and the descriptions are all changed. 

There are 4 different maps.

-Morgue: You wake up and you don't know where you are, but you remember that someone whispered in your ear to pick up those notes and get out of there quickly, because if you didn't, a huge beast would eat you. Find all the puzzles and get out of there immediately! (0 coins)

-School: A school, your hands. Collect as many notes as possible and get out of there! (2500 coins)

-Asylum: On this map you will find a totally abandoned asylum. Find the exit right away, a beast is looking for you inside the building. (15.000 coins)

-Cottage: is the last map to beat. The assassins have prepared the last challenge for you, and that is to get out of there. Collect all the notes and get out with the car.Be careful! ghosts live on this level, even if you are in a house they can go through the wall. Watch your back! (30.000 coins)

P.S: new maps coming soon

There are 3 types of enemies:

-Dead Woman: Dead woman is not an entirely dangerous enemy, but you have to be careful when you're distracted. Because when you least expect it, she can appear. (0 coins)

-Monster cannibal: Cannibal is a VERY dangerous enemy, because apart from the fact that he goes faster than the other assassins, he can devour you in one bite! He watches your back! because he can appear at any time. (2500 coins)

-Double Horror: Double horror is a game mode that includes the two murderers, on the one hand Dead woman and cannibal. Be very careful! you have two eaters. (12.500 coins)

P.S: new enemies coming soon

There are 3 types of difficulty levels:

-Easy: Enemy Speed: Slow, Enemy See Distance: 10 , Enemy FOV: Small , XP: * 0.5.

-Normal: Enemy Speed: Middle ,Enemy see Distance: 20, Enemy FOV: Normal, XP: * 1.5.

Hard: Enemy Speed: Fast, Enemy See Distance: 30, Enemy FOV: Large, XP: * 2.0

Coins:

Also the game have coins system:

How can I get coins?: You can get coins by collecting the pictures.

equivalencies:

1 picture: 100 coins

You escape on easy mode: 2500 coins

You escape on hard mode: 5000 coins

(You have to collect 10 pictures to escape)

Good luck!
